resources.string: This website or application is requesting authentication.
Contact your administrator to authorise this device.
The redirect URL is not valid
The date of the certificate is invalid.
The certificate is not yet valid.
The certificate authority is not trusted.
You should not proceed, especially if you have never seen this warning before for this site.
There are problems with the security certificate for this site.
Unable to detect a network connection
Your administrator has changed your TOS. You must log in and accept the TOS to continue.
We couldn\'t detect a network connection.
To log in, connect to a Wi-Fi or mobile data network.
We were unable to connect to your network.
Check your network connection and try again.
You are attempting to log in to Box from a location that has not been approved by your admin. Please talk to your admin to resolve this issue.

string.description: size with abbreviation for bytes used in folder list
string.name: boxsdk_bytes

string.description: size in binary kilobytes 1024 bytes used in folder list
string.name: boxsdk_kilobytes

string.description: size in binary megabyte 1024 * 1024 kbytes used in folder list
string.name: boxsdk_megabytes

string.description: size in binary gigabyte 1024 * 1024 mbytes used in folder list
string.name: boxsdk_gigabytes

string.description: size in binary terabyte 1024 * 1024 gbytes used in folder list
string.name: boxsdk_terabytes
